mention.text: san salvador , 21 jan 90 -- msgr arturo rivera y damas , archbishop of san salvador
the church 's position on the jesuits ' murder
president alfredo cristiani , who , by fulfilling his promise to get to the very bottom of the case through investigations , has become worthy of worldwide recognition
a fratricidal war for the past 10 years
rivera y damas reiterated that `` we must end this war through dialogue and rational means before the war
